EmailTemplate.name: Forge_Portal_Account-Reg-and-Creation_Temporary-Set-Up.Email 2 - Account Create
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for submitting your account registration for Honeywell Forge Connected Engines
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Forge Customer,
Thank you for submitting your account registration for Honeywell Forge Connected Engines Services. We are pleased to have you on the Honeywell Forge Platform.
The activation of your account and aircraft in Forge may take up to 1 - 2 business days to complete. A confirmation email will be sent to you when your account has been successfully activated.
Thank you for your patience,
Honeywell Forge
